name: Drag Racing: Shift Car Race
description:
In drag racing simulator game your main aim is that you have to drive your super-fast speed car with the opponent draggers.You need to drive your nitro drag racing car as fast as possible with your rivals to win the shift car driving challenge. Change the gear on time to increase the speed of your car try to change gear with the accurate perfect shift to move forward other car drivers. If you perfectly change gear on time it will boost up your speed and you will reach the finish point before your competitors. Drag racing classic car driving allows you the multiple challenging and interesting car drag racing challenges. Clear all missions carefully and successfully to become the winner of drag racing simulator 2018. You can play this super perfect shift game in two modes, multiplayer mode, and single-player mode select your desired drag racing HD mode and enjoy perfect shifting fun with free drag racing game.

Game Play:
Tap the accelerate button to boost the ride
Shift up and down your supercar simulator using the “+” and “-“buttons
Use the brake button while shifting down to perform drifts.

Top Feature of Perfect Drag Shift Racer Game:
• Offline racing and well as a drifting game.
• The real roar of the engine sound.
• Real crazy car crash effects.
• A lot of challenging drag missions to unlock.
• Smooth control with precise steering.
• Multiple cameras angle to enhance the view.
• A realistic 3D environment with astonishing visuals.
• Enjoy the thrill of the car race at insane speed on asphalt track!
• User-friendly GUI and controls.
• HD graphics and high-quality textures.
• A furious racing tribute!
